about_the_game:
Humans have not only left Earth, they've left behind space facilities and locations that are no longer habitable to them as well in the 'Desolate Space' series. In the Desolate Space: Contaminated Vessel episode DLC, you'll fly on the rail camera through an abandoned spacecraft that has been contaminated with an unknown bio-mass.

You can also control the warp camera to manually jump from place to place in the scene or use the slideshow setting and they'll cycle through automatically.

*This episode is currently ambiance only and does not include a hidden objects game. It does include the Secret Items game.*

This episode is part of the Ambient Channels: Collector's Pass 2020/2021

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or AMD R7 250x
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650Ti or AMD R7 260

short_description: In the 'Desolate Space' series, humans have left behind space facilities and locations that are no longer habitable. In the 'Contaminated Vessel' episode you make your way through an abandoned spacecraft that has been contaminated with an unknown organism.
